processor.name: DiscountRateLookup
processor.description: PCRate plug-in unconditional discount rate lookup.
processor.condition:
CREATE PROCEDURE condition @_ExecutePlugin BOOLEAN OUTPUT @GroupDiscountPass INTEGER AS
-- pass 0: rate an individual discount -- pass 1: rate a group discount -- pass 2: don't rate (already rated), let the member's group discount pass through
IF @GroupDiscountPass = 2 SET @_ExecutePlugin = FALSE ELSE SET @_ExecutePlugin = TRUE
